ideas.title: SPY Opening-Range / Intraday Momentum from AAD(OPEN) Breakout
ideas.core_idea: Adaptive intraday breakout on SPY using trailing AAD(OPEN) to set expansion thresholds; optionally condition on pre-open gap context to avoid fades. Captures early-session persistence and liquidity herding.
feature_transformations: 5–15m Opening Range Breakout with volume confirmation vs 20-day baseline
Gap-reversion veto when pre-open gap z-score < -1 reverts within 30m
ideas.universe_filters: SPY only; regular hours; skip macro minutes
ideas.directionality: Long/short breakouts; flat by close; ATR/AAD stops

strength_actionability.rationale: Paper + code + replications; liquid and simple to execute.

ideas.expected_horizon_notes: Backtest 2018–2025 1-min; walk-forward by year; 6 weeks live shadow

ideas.title: Night-vs-Day Drift—Long Overnight / Manage Intraday
ideas.core_idea: Hold index ETFs only from close to next open; avoid intraday exposure. Overnight drift aligns with liquidity provision dynamics and European hours; enhance with cross-sectional features to select stocks with persistent positive overnight profiles.
feature_transformations: Intraday volume-shape feature (U vs L) as enhancer
ideas.universe_filters: SPY/QQQ/IWM; S&P 500 constituents ADV > $10M for cross-section
ideas.directionality: Long overnight; optional intraday beta-hedge; gap-based risk cuts

strength_actionability.rationale: Strong descriptive studies; implementable with standard data; hedge design matters.

ideas.expected_horizon_notes: Backtest 1993–2025 daily + 2–5y intraday for shape; 8 weeks live

ideas.title: PEAD with Standardized Surprise & Volume Confirmation
ideas.core_idea: Long high SUE winners with abnormal post-print volume; short negative surprises. Drift persists due to under-reaction and attention limits.
feature_transformations: SUE normalized by historical analyst error volatility (8q)
Industry-neutral rank; exclude same-day guidance confounders
ideas.universe_filters: US stocks price > $3; ADV > $2M; exclude ADRs

strength_actionability.rationale: Deep literature + repeated practitioner guidance; clear data needs.

ideas.title: FOMC Day Effect—Buy Day-Before, Exit Announcement Close
ideas.core_idea: Systematically own SPY into scheduled FOMC decisions and exit same day after the statement. Reduced uncertainty and accommodative bias support short-window returns.
feature_transformations: Sector tilt overlay in high-probability pause/cut regimes

strength_actionability.rationale: Simple, low-trade-frequency seasonality with public calendars.

ideas.title: Turn-of-the-Month (ToM) Effect for SPY and Sector ETFs
ideas.core_idea: Allocate into month-end and early next month sessions where equity returns cluster. Use trend and vol targeting for robustness.

strength_actionability.rationale: Well-documented; ETF implementation is operationally simple.

ideas.title: Post-Lunch Positive Shift Intraday Mean Reversion
ideas.core_idea: Exploit the positive post-lunch drift by buying into midday weakness and exiting into early afternoon.
feature_transformations: VWAP deviation at 13:00 ET as qualifier

strength_actionability.rationale: Effect size modest; slippage control critical.

ideas.title: Overnight Gap Fade in First 30 Minutes
ideas.core_idea: Fade extreme pre-open gaps that partially revert as liquidity normalizes during the first 30 minutes.

ideas.title: Analyst EPS Revision Momentum (Short-Horizon)
ideas.core_idea: Accelerating positive FY1/FY2 EPS revisions predict near-term outperformance; negative streaks underperform.
feature_transformations: Net revisions count & magnitude in trailing 20d

strength_actionability.rationale: Broad practitioner use; clean data plumbing.

ideas.title: Insider Buying Clusters with Credibility Screen
ideas.core_idea: Multiple-executive purchase clusters where insiders increase personal wealth exposure predict positive abnormal returns; avoid noisy single trades.
feature_transformations: Cluster intensity: unique insiders + $volume over 30 days
Credibility proxy via insider delta/vega change

strength_actionability.rationale: Robust academic backing; requires filings pipeline.

ideas.title: 52-Week-High Proximity (PTH) Momentum
ideas.core_idea: Nearness to 52-week high dominates traditional momentum for forecasting returns; buy near highs, sell far-from-highs.
feature_transformations: PTH = price / 52-week high; long highest ranks

ideas.title: OPEX Week Monday Bias with Prior 5‑Day High
ideas.core_idea: During options-expiration week, Monday after a 5-day high close tends to lean positive due to dealer gamma dynamics.
ideas.directionality: Long Monday; or Fri close→Mon close

strength_actionability.rationale: Sparse but tradable; needs robust event controls.

ideas.title: Intraday Volume-Shape → Overnight Cross-Section
ideas.core_idea: Stocks with U-shaped intraday volume profiles deliver higher subsequent overnight returns than L-shaped profiles; build an overnight long-short on shape ranks.
ideas.directionality: Rank-long top decile, short bottom decile; beta-neutral

strength_actionability.rationale: New evidence; implementable with standard intraday feeds.
